faqs.question: Is this for beginners?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We start with the fundamentals of AI prompting and content strategy. As long as you have a desire to create bold content, you'll fit right in.

faqs.question: What if my content gets me in trouble?
faqs.answer: We have a whole module called 'Playing with Fire... Safely' dedicated to this. We teach you how to understand platform guidelines and push creative boundaries intelligently.

faqs.question: Do I need to buy expensive AI software?
faqs.answer: No! We focus on a mix of powerful free and affordable AI tools. You won't need to break the bank to get started.

faqs.question: Is there a refund policy?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a 14-day, no-questions-asked money-back guarantee. If you don't feel spicier after two weeks, we'll refund your purchase.

faqs.question: Will I get lifetime access?
faqs.answer: You bet. One-time payment gets you lifetime access to all current modules, our private community, and any future updates we add to the course.
